definitions.definition: A mythical beast having a horse 's body with a man 's head and torso in place of the head and neck of the horse.
An icy planetoid that orbits the Sun between Jupiter and Neptune .
A chess-playing team comprising a human player and a computer who work together.
A human and an AI who work together.

main_definition: ( Greek mythology ) A mythical beast having a horse 's body with a man 's head and torso in place of the head and neck of the horse.
secondary_definitions: ( astronomy , also capitalized ) An icy planetoid that orbits the Sun between Jupiter and Neptune .
( chess ) A chess-playing team comprising a human player and a computer who work together.
( by extension , artificial intelligence ) A human and an AI who work together.
